amendment.description: To provide for the conduct of a study to identify underlying contributing factors for pediatric cancer that are unique to certain States and to provide assistance to support States with a high incidence of such cancer.

vote.text: Amendment SA 3650 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.

action.text: Amendment SA 3650 proposed by Senator Moran for Senator Shaheen to Amendment SA 3399. (consideration: CR S5499-5503; text: CR S5501-5502) To provide for the conduct of a study to identify underlying contributing factors for pediatric cancer that are unique to certain States and to provide assistance to support States with a high incidence of such cancer.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 3650 proposed by Senator Moran for Senator Shaheen to Amendment SA 3399.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 3650 agreed to in Senate by Voice Vote.
